ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Camera Hardware Engineering group is responsible for all research, design, development, calibration, test, and qualification sensing devices for Apple products. This team is seeking for an exceptional HW Sensor and Image Sensor Production/Test Engineer with responsibilities for the evaluation, qualification, calibration, testing and benchmarking.

ul.li: Strong communication skills, professional, self-motivated and takes ownership of work
Strong knowledge of Sensing Hardware / Optical / Mechanical Principal a plus
Familiarity with mechanical design a plus
Good SW development skills with proficiency in: C/C++ programing and various algorithm prototyping and development skill
Expertise on OpenCV, OpenCL, OpenGL also a plus
Board level firmware development experience preferred
Experience with prototyping the solutions, bench testing methodology and testing environments for image sensing hardware preferred
Familiarity with processing large sized test results (statistical analysis)

div.p: Core Responsibilities: Developing/performing Lab and Mass Production (MP) intent type testing HW and SW for various sensing device characterization, calibration and test. Authoring the test plan documentation Design, and develop the software suite for evaluating, calibrating and testing hardware and image sensing modules for large volume MP Design, develop and provide the test/calibration infrastructure for MP Performing large scale data analysis Deliver executive level presentation
Frequent travel to both Apple and suppliers' facilities will be required for production bring up.
